name: 3d8cd360-c46e-5e8c-b6af-5251c80fedd5
notes: This service provides filter absorption photometer measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Pic du Midi, France (20170101 - 20180101). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Pic du Midi, France (20170101 - 20180101)
